entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor: Hot switching to WASM from Server Render Mode #59641

Closed

  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #59630
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, updates #59640
  • Getting Error In The Time Of Build Application #59549
  • Build failing incorrectly blaming missing files #59513

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update runtime download paths to directly point to the blob store #59624
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Redis distributed cache: add HybridCache usage signal #59543
    area-middleware
  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • don't throw a misleading exception upon a BadHttpRequestException #58688
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Upgrade to Microsoft.OpenApi 2.x and support OpenAPI v3.1 #59480
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Fixed Bug 59396 for Camel/Compliant casing. #59545
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • feat: extending `ApiBehaviorOptions` with skip `SkipStatusCodePages` #57597
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/9.0] Don't throw exception for parameters with custom binding source #59533
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-openapi, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
